message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's keep it fair.
Come on Bob, meet me in the middle, 58-42 is a fair compromise.
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
Don't bluff, we both lose if we don't agree. 57-43 is a good deal.
Okay, Alice. Let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both leave with something.
